: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus ducked for cover as Carnation's shots struck near by.
Rodimus Prime: We all must die someday Galvatron. You can run but your day is here!
Rodimus Prime could not help but see the irony of what he and Hydras had just said. They had reversed roles. Rodimus' mind drifts back.
-Flashback-
Within the belly of Unicron, the sounds of battle can be heard. It is dark as Galvatron stalks around, looking for his prey.
Galvatron: Come out Autobot, we all must die someday.
Rodimus, as Hot Rod, sneaks up behind Galvatron. Galvatron turns just in time to see his opponent before he strikes.
Hot Rod: Not today, Galvatron!
Hot Rod sends a strong right into Galvatron's face, knocking him from his feet.
Hot Rod transformes, driving away.
-End flashback-
Rodimus opens a comm on the Maxinal frequency.
Rodimus Prime: Maximals, this is the commander. Do not persue them in their retreat. They are trying to lead us into their defences.
Rodimus knew enough as commander to warn his troops but his anger over Nightlight blinded him to it. He gets up and chases after Hydras. He starts to repeatedly shoot at the Predacon leader.
 aerosmith4e@... wrote:Hydras laughed, "Not today Rodimus!" he let loose a fire ball igniting the 
shots sending him backwards a few feet. He sent an encoded comm to the 
troops, "Retreat back to the base, with the condition theyre in out defenses 
will rip them to pieces." Carnatron shot shots at Rodimus giving Hydras time 
to use his feet thrusters and start for the pred base.
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> After ramming into Hydras, Rodimus transformed back to his robot mode. However 
> the transformation process hurt like hell. Rodimus looked extreamly injured by 
> now. Ripped shreds of his armor were sticking out everywhere. Mech fluids 
> leaking from the wounds.
> Rodimus Prime: And you think I'm done? I said i was going to kill you...
> Rodimus draws on his plasma rifle once more, releasing four shots at Hydras.
>  aerosmith4e@... wrote:OOC:yea i fig my last post was suppose to allow you 
> to hit him...hm...ok
> Hydras eyes went wide and was flipped over Rodimus like her was hit by a car, 
> he spun around and landed on the ground with a crack. His wings were broken 
> and could no longer glide..if he had to hed use the thrusters on his feet. 
> Fire shot out from numerous places, lava like substance came from his mouth, 
> inside the two bots were hatching a plan.."What does it take to kill this 
> Maximal!" screamed Galvatron, "Yesss.. he is a true foe indeed.." Megatron 
> said with a snarl. Hydras stood up holding his ribs breathing heavy. "O 
> rodimus...were not done with you yet!"
> > 
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > The swords and tails rip the underbelly of Rodimus' car mode to shreds. 
> However 
> > since he was airborn and still moveing from his 300mph thrust, he continued at 
> > Hydras.
> > OOC: He cant really stop untill he hits something that'll do the job. He is 
> > supposed to have one hell of a collision with Hydras.
> >  aerosmith4e@... wrote:Hydras watched as the bot kept coming...."Aww 
> crap"

> out

> fire

> love

> > > his shoulder blasters rang out 15 shots all right onto the coming Rodimus.

> > > > Hydras' arms down. Rodimus then grabbed Hydras around the wrist with his

> > > Hydras' 
> > > > arm. With his balance on his left arm, Roddy flipped both legs up to 
> double 
> > > > dropkick Hydras. After hitting this he back flips away and to his feet.

> > > > Rodimus stands motionless, and optics look empty, like all hope had been 
> > lost.

> > > > Rodimus Prime: Enough of this! Maximals, kill these bastards in cold 
> fluid!

> > > > out an yell that could destroy an audio receptor. He is almost fomeing at 
> > the 
> > > > mouth, with the mixed mech fluids that leak from it. The anger causes his 
> > 
> > > normally blue optic sensors to turn a crimson red. His gaze locked on

<P><STRONG>: : Rodimus Prime : :</STRONG>

<P>Within the belly of Unicron, the sounds of battle can be heard. It is dark as Galvatron stalks around, looking for his prey.
<P><STRONG>Galvatron: </STRONG>Come out Autobot, we all must die someday.
<P>Rodimus, as Hot Rod, sneaks up behind Galvatron. Galvatron turns just in time to see his opponent before he strikes.
<P><STRONG>Hot Rod: </STRONG>Not today, Galvatron!

<P>Hot Rod transformes, driving away.

<P>Rodimus opens a comm on the Maxinal frequency.
<P><STRONG>Rodimus Prime: </STRONG>Maximals, this is the commander. Do not persue them in their retreat. They are trying to lead us into their defences.
<P>Rodimus knew enough as commander to warn his troops but his anger over Nightlight blinded him to it. He gets up and chases after Hydras. He starts to repeatedly shoot at the Predacon leader.
